      • initService

               @DrawableRes
               int notificationIcon,
               int updateInterval,
               int pushTimeout)
        Start SmartStore service
        Parameters:
        context - application context
        apiKey - app auth key
        objectKey - smart store object key
        baseActivity - class Activity for notification intent
        notificationIcon - notification icon resource
        updateInterval - server data update interval in milliseconds
        pushTimeout - beacon again detection timeout in milliseconds

      • setNotificationPosting

        public static void setNotificationPosting(android.content.Context context,
                          boolean needPosting)
        Disable or enable push notifications from service. If notifications disabled, only broadcast events will be posted, usefull for active app
        Parameters:
        context - application context
        needPosting - enable or disable notifications in app bar
